thread.title: Ian Stephens
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Ian Stephens

author: Ian Stephens
title: Ian Stephens
text: Excellent service having the car picked up and delivered back was a real bonus as I work during the day and saved having time off. People I spoke to were very helpful and Servicing stop were a pleasure to deal with. Car was picked up at time stated and delivered again with same promptness - Recommend to any one.
